title: Pacific Island life: family life
creator_credit: Hermann Schlenker and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Examines aspects of life in the Pacific Islands. Each family has its own field usually on one of the more fertile islands. Teheilau and his family take a boat trip to attend to their plot where they grow taro and tumeric. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
